Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.commands.normalCommands

Class NormalActionCommand

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.commands.normalCommands.NormalActionCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Command
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuyCardAction, ChooseLeaderCardsCommand, ChooseMarblesCommand, EndTurnCommand, InsertInWarehouseCommand, ProductionCommand, SelectPositionCommand, SelectResourcesFromWarehouseCommand, ShiftResourcesCommand
public abstract class NormalActionCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements Command
this abstract class represent the normal action of a player. in particular, it will be extended from all the classes that represent a command executable only once during the turn [choose marbles, buy card, production], it contains all the methods to send in broadcast some game changes

    NormalActionCommand()

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected ResponseToClient buildResponseToInsertInWarehouse​(CommandInterpreter interpreter, Game game, java.util.List<Marble> marbles)
    this method send to the client that chose the choose_marbles action a response containing the resources gained from the selection.
    protected DevelopmentCard getCard​(CommandInterpreter interpreter, Game game)
    this method get the card from the cards market with the level and the color that are stored in the interpreter passed as parameter.
    java.util.List<CommandName> getNormalActions()
    this method get a list containing all the normal actions of the game
    protected void sendBroadcastMarbleAction​(ClientHandler client)
    this method send for each client the changes to the game when a player do a choose_marbles action: the marble market, and the new state of every player

  • Method Details

    • getNormalActions

      public java.util.List<CommandName> getNormalActions()
      this method get a list containing all the normal actions of the game
      Returns:
      a list containing all the normal actions of the game

    • sendBroadcastMarbleAction

      protected void sendBroadcastMarbleAction​(ClientHandler client)
      this method send for each client the changes to the game when a player do a choose_marbles action: the marble market, and the new state of every player
      Parameters:
      client - this is the client that notify everyone of the change

    • buildResponseToInsertInWarehouse

      protected ResponseToClient buildResponseToInsertInWarehouse​(CommandInterpreter interpreter, Game game, java.util.List<Marble> marbles)
      this method send to the client that chose the choose_marbles action a response containing the resources gained from the selection. in particular, it convert the marbles passed in input into the collectionResources correspondent and store it into a buffer, then create the set of resources starting from the collection gained it also set into a buffer all the resources gained from the selection and change the possible commands to [insert_in_warehouse] (the name of the method)
      Parameters:
      interpreter - this is the command interpreter containing all the buffers
      game - this is the game in which the method have to call the convert
      marbles - these are the marbles to convert
      Returns:
      the response to send to the client

    • getCard

      protected DevelopmentCard getCard​(CommandInterpreter interpreter, Game game)
      this method get the card from the cards market with the level and the color that are stored in the interpreter passed as parameter. it requires that the card exist and the level and the color have been previously set
      Parameters:
      interpreter - this is the interpreter that contains the level and the color to get
      game - this is the game in which get the cards market
      Returns:
      the card selected
